para.text: For machine with RWH option, the cradle is locked at 0 degrees by brackets to prevent the RWH from tilting during shipping.

li.text: Remove top [1] and side [3] locking fixture brackets from the RWH cradle right side.
After fixture bracket removal, install the top and bottom internal covers.

list.style: margin-top:8px; margin-left:19px; line-height:1.18; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Adjust the angle of the cradle (or A-axis) to have clearance for the installation of covers.

para.text: This completes the removal of RWH locking fixture.
